description:
RLogin is a terminal software that runs on Windows.
RLogin supports three protocols: rlogin, telnet, and ssh (version 1 and 2), and supports secure encrypted communication for remote server maintenance.
It supports EUC, SJIS, UTF-8, etc., and can display a variety of character codes by switching banks according to ISO-2022.
It can be used as an ANSI or vt100 console, and supports escape sequences based on xterm for screen control.
summary: RLogin is a terminal software that runs on Windows.
author: kmiya-culti
